choices.no-ratio: Do not set an aspect ratio
Do not set an aspect ratio

fields.label: Principal Link
fields.name: grantee_principal_link
fields.instructions: The link you add (if any) should point to one of three locations: 1.	The grantee's exhibit in the digital archive; 2. The self-hosted DoOO website; 3. The grantee's self-hosted website elsewhere on the web.

fields.label: Background Color
fields.name: background_color
fields.instructions: This color will appear behind images with transparent backgrounds.

fields.label: Audio Description of Video Background
fields.name: audio_descriptions
fields.instructions: Visual content within multimedia must be described via audio in order for the multimedia to be optimally accessible to users with visual disabilities.

sub_fields.label: Language and instructions
sub_fields.name: instructions
sub_fields.instructions: Provide the language and instructions. For example: Hear an English language description of this background video.

fields.label: Contributors
fields.name: contributors_grid
fields.instructions: Select the Contributor whose card should appear at this position. You may drag and drop the rows here to change the order of the cards.

fields.label: Event Start Date & Time
fields.name: event_start_date
fields.instructions: This is the date and time the event happens.

fields.label: Archive On
fields.name: archive_date
fields.instructions: This is the date and  time the event should begin showing as a "Past" event.

fields.label: Date & Time Heading
fields.name: date_time_heading
fields.instructions:
Enter the Date, Time and Location information here. Example:

Tues, 29 Jun 2023 1:00 â€“ 3:00 PM
Tucson Marriott University Park

fields.label: Intro
fields.name: intro
fields.instructions: Add a short intro to appear on the listing for event.

sub_fields.label: Detail Page Copy
sub_fields.name: column_one
sub_fields.instructions: The Detail Page Copy is the longer form block of information for the event appearing on the Event Detail page.

fields.label: Call to Action Text
fields.name: cta_text
fields.instructions: This is the text on the event details button.  30 character maximum.

sub_fields.label: Button Text
sub_fields.name: button_text
sub_fields.instructions:
30 Character maximum. This is the text for the button.  Example:

Register for this event.

sub_fields.label: Button URL
sub_fields.name: button_url
sub_fields.instructions: This is the URL where the button will take users.

sub_fields.label: Headshot
sub_fields.name: headshot
sub_fields.instructions: Use a square image sized to a minimum of 600x600 pixels.
